Wayanad landslide: Centre reiterates Kerala has sufficient funds for relief measures

Wayanad: The Centre has reiterated that Kerala has sufficient funds in the State Disaster Response Fund (SDRF) for relief operations after the Wayanad landslide. In

title: The role of KKK Nair in the Ayodhya movement is well documented. However, it is to be noted that the WhatsApp forward shared with us has certain portions exaggerated and can be considered hyperbole.
vclaim: The Central government states that Kerala has adequate funds in the State Disaster Response Fund to handle relief operations following the Wayanad landslide.
